transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .pc-element{display:block}@media (width <= 1279px){.pc-element{display:none}}.mo-element{display:none}@media (width <= 1279px){.mo-element{display:block}}#snb{align-items:flex-start;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.239);bottom:0;display:flex;flex-direction:column;font-size:2rem;height:40%;justify-content:flex-start;left:0;line-height:4.4rem;margin:auto 0;min-height:40rem;position:fixed;top:0;width:17.3rem;z-index:1000}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb{align-items:flex-start;background-color:#171622;bottom:unset;height:100vh;justify-content:space-between;left:unset;max-width:50rem;overflow-y:scroll;padding:0;right:0;top:0;transform:translateX(100%);transition:.5s cubic-bezier(.19,1,.22,1);width:60%;-ms-overflow-style:none;scrollbar-width:none}}@media (width <= 1279px) and (width <= 500px){#snb{max-height:100%;min-width:23rem;width:70%}}@media (width <= 1279px) and (height <= 420px){#snb{height:100%;min-height:100%}}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb.__active{transform:translateX(0)}}#snb .mob-snb-header{display:none}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .mob-snb-header{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;padding:2rem}}#snb .mob-snb-header .snb-logo{display:block;width:50%}#snb .mob-snb-header .snb-logo>img{width:100%}#snb .mob-snb-header .snb-close{align-items:center;background-color:#100f18;border:1px solid #3b3a41;display:flex;height:5rem;justify-content:center;width:5rem}#snb .mob-snb-header .snb-close>img{width:50%}#snb .snb-list{display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:100%;justify-content:space-between;margin-left:3rem}#snb .snb-list:before{background-color:#b8b8b8;content:"";display:block;height:89%;position:absolute;right:calc(100% - 2.5rem);top:2rem;width:.1rem}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .snb-list:before{display:none}#snb .snb-list{align-items:center;margin-left:0;width:100%}}@media (width <= 500px){#snb .snb-list{height:70%}}#snb .snb-list>li{height:12.5%;position:relative}#snb .snb-list>li:last-child{border-bottom:none}#snb .snb-list>li>a{color:#fff;display:block;font-size:1.6rem;font-weight:500;padding-left:1.5rem}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .snb-list>li>a{font-size:2rem;padding-left:0}}@media (width <= 500px){#snb .snb-list>li>a{font-size:1.5rem}}#snb .snb-list>li>a:after,#snb .snb-list>li>a:before{background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:contain;content:"";display:block;position:absolute;right:100%}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .snb-list>li>a:after,#snb .snb-list>li>a:before{display:none}}#snb .snb-list>li>a:before{height:1rem;top:1.7rem;width:1rem}#snb .snb-list>li>a:after{display:none;height:2.5rem;right:calc(100% - .25rem);top:1rem;width:1.5rem}#snb .snb-list>li>a.__active{text-shadow:.3rem .2rem 1rem #f10}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .snb-list>li>a.__active{text-shadow:none}}#snb .snb-list>li>a.__active:before{display:none}#snb .snb-list>li>a.__active:after{display:block}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .snb-list>li>a.__active:after{display:none}}#snb .snb-list .snb-min-menu{padding-left:1rem}#snb .login-btn,#snb .logout-btn{width:100%;z-index:999}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .login-btn,#snb .logout-btn{margin:0 auto 3rem;width:60%}#snb .login-btn:hover:after,#snb .logout-btn:hover:after{display:none}}@media (width <= 500px){#snb .login-btn,#snb .logout-btn{width:90%}}#snb .login-btn>span,#snb .logout-btn>span{color:#fff;font-size:1.6rem;font-weight:700;justify-content:flex-start;top:1rem;width:80%}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .login-btn>span,#snb .logout-btn>span{justify-content:center;left:-20%}}#snb .login-btn>span:after,#snb .logout-btn>span:after{background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:contain;content:"";display:inline-block;height:1.5rem;margin-left:.3rem;vertical-align:middle;width:1.5rem}#snb .logout-btn:after,#snb .mob-snb-footer{display:none}@media (width <= 1279px){#snb .mob-snb-footer{background-color:#13121d;flex-direction:column;height:20%;padding:3rem;width:100%}#snb .mob-snb-footer,#snb .mob-snb-footer>ul{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:center}#snb .mob-snb-footer>ul{gap:1rem;width:90%}#snb .mob-snb-footer .download-list>li>a{color:#fff;display:block;font-size:1.5rem}#snb .mob-snb-footer .download-list>li>a:after{content:"";display:inline-block;height:2rem;margin-left:1rem;vertical-align:middle;width:2rem}#snb .mob-snb-footer .download-list+.sns-list{margin-top:1rem}#snb .mob-snb-footer .sns-list>li{background-color:#0d0d14;border:1px solid #56565b;height:5rem;width:5rem}#snb .mob-snb-footer .sns-list>li>a{box-sizing:border-box;display:block;height:100%;padding:1rem}#snb .mob-snb-footer .sns-list>li>a>img{width:100%}}@keyframes opacity{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}
